data.text: @shmandz Hi. We are sorry for the incident on your flight. If the second flight was booked on our website and operated by Iberia. We suggest you verify your alternatives with our colleagues at the airport, upon arrival at the first destination. We are attentive to your case. Kind regards.
@AlisonFranck Hello; Alison. Please send us a DM with all the details of your case. We gladly help you. Kind regards.
@NAISOLA Hello. We are sorry for the incident with your luggage. Please send us all the details through a DM. We will be attentive to your response. Kind regards.
@realJRfromCA Hola. We're sorry to read this. Could you provide us with details about your claim via DM so that we may verify the status of it? We remain at your disposal.

@r2_mmn Hello, we are deeply sorry to read about that. Could you please, let us know your claim code, so that we can review it? Iberia claim codes are similar to this example: E20160928-01234567. We remain at your disposal. Regards.

@Carkreuz Hola, we are truly sorry to read about that. Could you please, send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with any detail you could consider important so that we could review your case? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@imrantugra Hola, please send us a DM with your claim reference number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@isasilencio Hola Isabel, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our apologies. Your comments will be taken in consideration to improve the quality of our services. Kind regards
@annmoo You're very welcome, Anne! Happy birthday :)
@ineediberia Hola. We're sorry to read this. Please read our reply to your DM's. Regards.
@ManiacMcCormill We're very sorry. If you don't receive the bag after 21 days of search, you can claim compensation based on the bag's content. We remain at your disposal. Best regards
@LOL_010Roffa DM checked and replied :)

@525Maggie Hola, please delete the tweet where you wrote the PIR reference and send us a DM with such information. As we can see, the delivery process was initiated two days ago, so you should receive the bag within 24h. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @LucasAsher5 The upgrade doesn't apply in cases like yours, Lucas. We're not able to attend your request. Sorry
@meeradeo Please select 'assistance' as claim type and then use the text field to explain what happened. If an 'error message' pops up, you just need to keep clicking on 'continue'. Regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @meeradeo Hola Meera, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our sincerest apologies. In case you wish to file a formal complaint and have it analysed by our customer care team, please access: https://t.co/pVVvyg1YzT. /1

@martulan Hola Mar, ¿nos confirmas si tras el incidente iniciaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto?. Si es así, por favor envíanos tu nombre completo y el código PIR asociado por MD. Revisaremos. 
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@maryymaxx8 Hola Mj, ¿cómo podemos ayudarte?. Déjanos saber por MD si hay algo en lo que podamos asistirte desde este departamento para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Un saludo.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@LucasAsher5 Sorry to read this, Lucas. We've replied your DMs. Unfortunately, the free upgrade doesn't apply. Apologies
@LucasAsher5 Hola Lucas, we're sorry to read this. If we issued your ticket, need a flight relocation and is currently at the airport, please contact our colleagues at the airport. Kind regards
@ArtySausage Hola, sorry to read this. We've replied your new DMs
@smdoung Hola Shannon, sorry for the delay. Our colleagues sent a message to the JFK airport asking them to collected the bag with you. So you should be contacted shortly to arrange this. Apologies

data.text: @TheRealGiovana Sorry for the delay, Giovana. We've replied your DM

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @Bouliajsvdvska Hola, sorry to read this. If you are still at the airport and the flight was operated by us, please contact our colleagues at the airport. If you already went back home, you can use the following form https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG
@Reg_the_ledge We've just replied it :)

@Reg_the_ledge Hola Regina, our phone lines do play music when a passenger is on hold. Could you please send us a DM informing the number you called and confirming that no music was played while on hold? https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@MorsePacific420 Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number, full name and email address https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Zak57862015 We remain at your disposal.
@badverybadboy Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@TIFFUNKY_ Thanks, Tiffany. We'll contact the relevant department and keep you posted. Best regards
@MrAlford14 Hello Alfy, please fill again the form choosing assistance, there you can explain why you should receive another reply. Thank you.
@wilshawalex Hola Alex, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@Zak57862015 Usually she can reach our staff and they will help her to reschedule the flight and take her to her final destination.
@Zak57862015 She can contact our staff at the airport, they will help her gladly. Regards.
@Zak57862015 You can use ou international line dialing to the +34 91 333 67 01. Regards.
@LOL_010Roffa The ticket was sent to the email registered in the booking management page. We've replied your DM, please check

@Zak57862015 Hola Zac, please contact with Serviberia, in the following link you will find the available number for your country https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t and our colleagues can give you the available options. Thank you.
@Sporthub365 Hola, we've replied the DM. Best regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @MrAlford14 form https://t.co/pVVvyg2wpr. Select  ‘assistance’ as complaint reason, then choose any other option and use the text box to inform your original claim code and provide additional infos explaining exactly what you need. Regards

@MrAlford14 Hola, notice that the email sent by our colleagues on july 18 was sent from a ''no-reply'' address, meaning that it doesn't accept replies. If you wish to appeal and have the case reviewed by our colleagues, you need to use the same online /1
@TIFFUNKY_ Hola Tiffany, please send us the details and complaint number or file by DM? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@TeacherBriBri Hola Brianna, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@BarbaraChambers Hola Barbara, we request some details by DM. Regards.
@ianwsmith76 Hola Ian, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@paulapomroy Hola Paula, do you have a PIR or report number, please let us know this and all the details by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@pierce_angelus Hola Audrey, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your case number to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Da_Gem_In_I Hola Bills, could you please give us by DM your PIR code or complaint number to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @aheneves Hola Neha, you can verify all requirements through this link: https://t.co/LkPa7AquxF . Kind regards
@MrAlford14 Hola Alfy, we are sorry to read this , could you please give us by DM more details and your complaint number? Thanks in advance
@esthervdoorn Thank you Esther. We have replied your DM. Regards
@vacernuda Thank you Viviana, we have replied your DM. Regards
@amberleahhx Amber, could you please give us by DM more details of your inquiry including screenshot of the flights you are searching? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Da_Gem_In_I Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have responded previously to your message with all  requirements to open the complaint. Regards
@LuisGar84052533 Hola Luis, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@jonathanabujj Please send us a DM with your IBPlus number, full name and email address https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Lilflo86 Hola, we've just replied your DM. Best regards
@LOL_010Roffa Hola, we've just replied the DM and sent your e-ticket by email. Best regards
@dickmeredith Hola, sorry to read this. Since your PIR (property irregularity report) belongs to TAP, please contact them directly for further assistance. Best regards

urls.title: Iberia voucher: ticket refund to spend whenever you want
urls.description: Are you flying soon but are not able to fly? We can refund the amount in the form of a voucher to use whenever and however you want. Check terms & conditions

data.text: @amberleahhx Hola Amber, you can check the conditions of your voucher through the following link https://t.co/tKLTKrKTN4. Kind regards.

@vacernuda Hola Viviana, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@SchobitzRuben Hola Ruben, could you send us more details by DM, please? Regards.
@Stephvgreen We've just replied it. Sorry for the delay
@esthervdoorn Hola, we've sent you a new DM. Best regards

@redlionny Hola, please allow 72h after the account's creation and try to login through our app. In case it doesn't work, you should contact the Iberia Plus Centre through the following form https://t.co/06AWpCFy0H . Kind regards
@ashyos Hola Ashy. Sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@rebekah72058850 Hola Rebekah, sorry for the inconvenience. We've just replied your DMs. Kind regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @chillwann Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. In order to use the claims form, please select ''assistance'' as claim type and then use the text field to quote the PIR reference. If an ''error'' pops up, you just need to keep clicking on ''continue'' https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG
@racheldpak Hola Rachel, our colleagues sent you details regarding the case by email, please check also the spam folder. At the moment the search is still under process. Regards
@BarbaraChambers Hola Barbara, do you have a case number? If so, could you send it to us by DM? Kind regards.
@diana_sharifi Hola Diana, we don't know the details of your case, did you get a PIR number at the airport? If so, could you send us the details and your full name by DM, please?
@CRUIZELIST Hola, are you within 24 hours before the flight? If so, and you still can't do it, you can check in at the airport. Kind regards.

@tarantula_arms Hola Michael, please send us the reservation code and all the information you consider relevant by DM to review the conditions of use associated with your voucher. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@brueckenpepe Hola, we have responded to your direct messages. Kind regards.
@nomyeongrey Hello Dakyung, we will ask for an update for your case and we will contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@dwayne_trip Hola Dwayne, we replied to your DM. Regards.

urls.title: How Far Can a Commercial Jetliner Fly? - Me gusta volar
urls.description: Have you ever wondered what is the maximum distance an aircraft can fly and what are the factors that determine an aircraft's flight range?

data.text: If you want to find out more about the autonomy of our planes, don't miss this article 👉 https://t.co/UoY5nHDSyH
Which of our planes can fly for up to 20 hours (11,000 km) without stopping to refuel?
Weather conditions are another factor that impacts how long and how far a plane can fly (4/6)
As well as fuel, it also depends on the weight of the plane, which varies according to the number of passengers, cargo, bags and… (3/6)
A plane's autonomy depends on...  (2/6)

Today we’re talking about the factors that influence a plane’s autonomy – in other words, how long and how far it can fly without stopping to refuel. ✈️ Follow the thread (1/6) https://t.co/vF82vhFgPs
@leslyann37 We've sent you a DM 50 minutes ago stating that our colleagues sent you an email with the resolution to your case. Please check all folders, including the spam. Best regards
@222gabbyb Hola, sorry for the delay. We've replied your DMs. Regards
@leslyann37 Hello Lesly Ann, we will check your case internally and contact you with the available updates as soon as possible. Regards.
@wilshawalex Hola Alex, we replied to your DM. Best regards.
@meeradeo Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Stephvgreen https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@rayalseematiger Hola, we've replied your DM. Please check
